Job ID: 409
Raw description:  Marketing: 1 year Secondary School Scarborough, ON We are a forensic laboratory located in Toronto. Our in-house web developer is looking for a marketing specialist to help market our DNA tests. We offer the lowest price paternity test on the market. We process thousands of tests a year for both personal and legal purposes. We are currently in the process of revamping our website and require somebody to assist out web developer with the marketing of our products. This role would suit a student studying marketing or a new graduate. We are very flexible with schedules. This is a casual role to start with but may lead to ongoing assignments based on performance. Must be ok with dogs : ) we are pet friendly! To apply, please send your resume and a letter about yourself to Keith Job Type: Casual Experience: Education: Location: Apply Now 
            Please review all application instructions before applying to Accu Metrics.
